content: Sea level rise, coupled with storm surge, will continue to increase the risk of major coastal impacts on transportation infrastructure, including both temporary and permanent flooding of airports, ports and harbors, roads, rail lines, tunnels, and bridges.
translations: ita:L'innalzamento del livello marino, insieme con le ondate di tempesta, continuer√† ad aumentare il rischio di gravi riperc
